answers.answer: Hi,Thanks for writing in.At the moment it seems to be due to stress and anxiety. Make sure you eat on time, drink enough water and sleep for at least 8 hrs. Breathing exercises will also help.Other possibilities include peripheral neuropathy due to diabetes and B12 deficiency.Please get your blood sugar levels and blood pressure checked.Keep us posted!

question: Yes, I have been getting light needle like pain to my head, but dont happen very often. They happen every once in a while in diffrent areas of my head for example they move from side to side of my head. Also there times that I feel light headed and dizzy. Do you know what it might be. Thank you.
title: Needle like Pain to Head
